      • createEmptyGrid

        static void createEmptyGrid(javafx.scene.layout.VBox container,
                            java.lang.String bgColor,
                            int row,
                            int column,
                            int insetsSpacing,
                            int rowSpacing,
                            int cellDim)
        Creates a generic grid using HBox and VBox in container
        Parameters:
        container - is where grid must be put
        bgColor - contains the background color of the grid
        row - contains the grid's row
        column - contains the grid's column
        insetsSpacing - contains the Insets's value
        rowSpacing - contains the row's spacing
        cellDim - contains the cell's dimension
